renameByName.Value #D: 容器文件系统读取速率
renameByName.Value #E: 容器文件系统写入速率

targets.expr: (sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{name=~"$name",instance=~"$instance",image!=""}) by (container, pod,name) + sum(container_memory_rss{name=~"$name",instance=~"$instance",image!=""}) by (container, pod,name) -sum(container_memory_cache{name=~"$name",instance=~"$instance",image!=""}) by (container, pod,name)) / sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{name=~"$name",instance=~"$instance",image!=""}) by (container, pod,name) * 100
